columns.id: The unique identifier for each train.
columns.train_number: The official number assigned to the train.
columns.name: The name of the train service.
columns.origin: The starting station of the train.
columns.destination: The final station of the train.
columns.time: The scheduled time of train departure.
columns.interval: The frequency of the train's service.

train.table_description: The table stores details about train schedules and routes.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each station.
columns.local_authority: The governing authority for the station's location.
columns.network_name: The name of the transport network serving the station.
columns.services: The services operated at the station.

station.table_description: The table holds information about different transport stations and their details.

columns.train_id: The unique identifier for the train on the route.
columns.station_id: The unique identifier for the station along the route.

route.table_description: The table connects trains with their respective stations.

columns.station_id: The unique identifier for each weather station.
columns.day_of_week: The day of the week for the weather report.
columns.high_temperature: The maximum recorded temperature for the day.
columns.low_temperature: The minimum recorded temperature for the day.
columns.precipitation: The amount of precipitation recorded in the day.
columns.wind_speed_mph: The wind speed recorded in miles per hour.

weekly_weather.table_description: The table provides weekly weather data for various stations.
